events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at a traffic intersection, requesting to file a claim immediately.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident claim based on the description of the car collision provided by the claimant.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure prompt and thorough processing of the auto accident claim.
The customer received official acknowledgment of their claim filing, confirming that their case was now active in the system.
The claims team requested additional documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and the claimant’s driver license.
The claimant uploaded all requested documentation including photos of the collision scene and the official police accident report.
The claims investigator commenced thorough review of all submitted materials to assess the extent of damage and liability factors.
Investigation concluded successfully confirming that the other party was at fault and the damage estimates were verified by the assessor.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs and related expenses for the claimant’s vehicle damage sustained in the accident.
The claimant provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the promptness of communication and the offered settlement terms.
Approval was granted on the claim following acceptance of the settlement proposal by the claimant after thorough review.
The agreed settlement payment was issued to the claimant’s account to cover the full amount of verified vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the claimant received payment and the vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All case documentation and communications were archived securely in the system for record-keeping and future reference if needed.
